Description: Body fragment of a large black-glazed, ribbed pottery vessel ('Plakettenvase'); ribbed surface (14 ribs); remains of plastic relief decoration. Hard, dense, light grey clay; thick shell-like calcium deposits on inside and outside except for small areas cleared by conservators.
Bibliographic references: Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 348)
Acquisition notes: Found unregistered in the Department in 2010, in a box with other sherds from Tell Dafana.
